description.value: Your shapeshifting grants you a magical connection to the animal world. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Animal Messenger]{Animal Messenger}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Calm Emotions]{Calm Emotions} (animals only), and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Speak with Animals]{Speak with Animals} as 2nd-level primal innate spells once per day each. These spells use your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
